comments:
20060117

I got the following exception while running the test suites in my log

	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:324)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.invokeFramework(Main.java:338)

	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:952)

I think this was happening during the tests because there is some code in a listener that runs in an asyncExec (see bug 123785 for more info). The code probably wasn't running until after the text was disposed, since the tests run so fast.  I added an isDisposed check at the beginning of the listener code.
